pages.text: Through the power of the Concentrated Emerald, you've found a way to create an Amulet that increases the power of the Fangs spawned from the Biting Spell, but only after it's enchanted with Sharpness.
By having it on the Hotbar, or in the Necklace Slot if Curios is installed, Fangs will deal more damage depending on the level of Sharpness the Amulet has.
